document.full_text: chip maker texas instruments inc  warned of slower-than-usual quarterly sales growth as it scrambles to restart production after japan's massive earthquake, and said it was unclear when the supply of the silicon and wafers it needs will return to normal.
document.title: texas instruments misses forecasts, blames japan
lines_and_colors: chip maker texas instruments inc  warned of slower-than-usual quarterly sales growth as it scrambles to restart production after japan's massive earthquake, and said it was unclear when the supply of the silicon and wafers it needs will return to normal.
